description: Verifies the user's email address using a verification token sent via email. Marks the email as verified upon success.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The verification token received via email

parameters.name: callbackURL
parameters.description: The URL to redirect to after email verification

status.description: Indicates if the email was verified successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired verification token

details.message: The verification token is invalid or has expired

x-specs.given: A user with valid verification token
x-specs.when: User clicks verification link with valid token
x-specs.then: Returns 200 OK and marks email as verified
